kernel_stencil.reasoning: All three conditions are independent, side-effect-free bounds checks guarding the stencil update for interior points; there are no else branches and no variable modifications within the conditions. Combining them into a single if preserves semantics (short-circuit order is irrelevant due to no side effects) and reduces indentation, improving readability.
